text: Stephanie Kelton (née Bell; born October 10, 1969) is an American economist and academic. She is currently a professor at Stony Brook University and a Senior Fellow at the Schwartz Center for Economic Policy Analysis at the New School for Social Research. She was a professor at the University of Missouri–Kansas City. She also was an advisor to Bernie Sanders' 2016 presidential campaign. She is founder and editor-in-chief of the blog New Economic Perspectives. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:American economists Category:Academics from Missouri Category:American political commentators Category:Writers from Kansas City, Missouri Category:Academics from New York City
title: Stephanie Kelton
